homepage.title: Welcome to lnd-boilerplate
homepage.subtitle: A starter kit for creating high-performance, interactive, and offline-capable content platforms
homepage.description: lnd-boilerplate is a foundation for building websites where User Experience (UX), Developer Experience (DX), and performance are top priorities.

features.title: Key Features
features.nextjs: Next.js + Nextra - Hybrid rendering with file-based routing
features.typescript: TypeScript - Full type safety across the entire application
features.tailwind: Tailwind CSS + Shadcn/UI - Utility-first CSS with composable components
features.pwa: PWA Support - Progressive Web App with offline capabilities
features.i18n: Internationalization - Multi-language support with RTL layouts
features.search: Search Integration - Typesense-powered search with typo tolerance
features.cms: Content Management - Git-based CMS with Sveltia

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: lnd-boilerplate is designed to be the ultimate starting point for developers who want to build content platforms that prioritize:
mission.performance: Performance - Lightning-fast loading and smooth interactions
mission.ux: User Experience - Intuitive interfaces that work seamlessly
mission.dx: Developer Experience - Clean, maintainable code with modern tooling
mission.accessibility: Accessibility - Inclusive design that works for everyone
mission.offline: Offline Capability - Content that's always available

philosophy.title: Technology Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe in using the right tool for the job. Our stack is carefully chosen to provide:
philosophy.modern: Modern Development - Latest stable versions of all dependencies
philosophy.typesafety: Type Safety - Full TypeScript coverage for better DX
philosophy.performance_dev: Performance - Optimized builds with modern bundling
philosophy.scalability: Scalability - Monorepo structure that grows with your project
philosophy.standards: Standards - Web standards and best practices

blog.title: Blog
blog.welcome: Welcome to the lnd-boilerplate blog! Here you'll find insights, tutorials, and updates about building high-performance content platforms.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.welcome: Welcome to the lnd-boilerplate documentation! This guide will help you understand how to use and customize the platform.

footer.description: A starter kit for creating high-performance, interactive, and offline-capable content platforms. Built with Next.js, Nextra, and modern web technologies.
